chunks.zh: T 楼抽奖免费送出（顺丰包邮）30 张全新待激活的英国 giffgaff 卡
chunks.en: T-floor lottery offers 30 brand new, unactivated UK giffgaff SIM cards for free (SF Express shipping included)

chunks.zh: 2025 提前祝大家元宵节快乐，今年再次抽奖回馈大家，可以参加充 10 元送 5 元的活动。
chunks.en: Wishing everyone a Happy Lantern Festival in advance for 2025! This year, we're holding another lottery to give back, and you can participate in the promotion of recharging 10 yuan and getting 5 yuan.

chunks.zh: **T 楼抽奖规则**
chunks.en: **T-Floor Lottery Rules**

chunks.zh: 奖品：30 张全新待激活的英国 giffgaff 卡
chunks.en: Prizes: 30 brand new, unactivated UK giffgaff SIM cards

chunks.zh: 参与方式：T 楼，不限内容，每人参与一次，重复回复会判无效，随机楼层中
chunks.en: How to participate: Comment on the T-floor, any content is allowed, each person can participate once, duplicate replies will be invalid, random floor selection.

chunks.zh: 开奖规则：请参考 [V2EX 抽奖小程序]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1106143)
chunks.en: Lottery rules: Please refer to the [V2EX Lottery Mini Program]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1106143)

chunks.zh: 开奖时间：2025-02-09 21:25 自动开奖(取决于 21:25 前的楼层数和当天的排列五组合结果，有兴趣的可以参考 [V2EX 抽奖小程序]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1106143) 自己测算)
chunks.en: Draw Time: 2025-02-09 21:25 Automatic draw (depends on the number of floors before 21:25 and the results of the permutation five combination that day, those interested can refer to the [V2EX Lottery Mini Program]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1106143) to calculate it themselves)

chunks.zh: **如何领奖**
chunks.en: **How to Claim the Prize**

chunks.zh: 1 访问 [免费邮寄]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/CFdIwKKq8i9GfpkDLarcW1hEnEw) 提交邮寄信息
chunks.en: 1 Visit [Free Shipping]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/CFdIwKKq8i9GfpkDLarcW1hEnEw) to submit shipping information

chunks.zh: 2 访问 [联系我们]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) 联系客服审核
chunks.en: 2 Visit [Contact Us]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) to contact customer service for review

chunks.zh: 3 客服审核通过后预计次日寄出
chunks.en: 3 After customer service review, it is expected to be sent out the next day
4 Deadline for claiming the prize: 2025-02-11

chunks.zh: **万一没有中奖呢**
chunks.en: **What if you don't win?**

chunks.zh: 没有抽中的也可以[联系我们]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) 购买预置套餐或者储值的，[产品规格]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/HNJ4w88l5i1tHBkUGEfcZneZnlg) 更丰富。
chunks.en: If you don't win, you can also [Contact Us]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) to purchase pre-set packages or top-ups, with richer [product specifications]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/HNJ4w88l5i1tHBkUGEfcZneZnlg).

chunks.zh: 实在对时效没有要求（大约需要 1 个月时间）的，也可以
chunks.en: If you don't have strict requirements for timeliness (it takes about 1 month), you can also

chunks.zh: 参考 [这可能是目前最全面的 giffgaff 实体卡申请指南]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1095967)
chunks.en: Refer to [This may be the most comprehensive guide to applying for a giffgaff physical SIM card]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1095967)

chunks.zh: 或者
chunks.en: Or

chunks.zh: 参考 [英国实体 SIM 卡 giffgaff 申请、激活和使用攻略]( https://github.com/360card/giffgaff)
chunks.en: Refer to [UK Physical SIM Card giffgaff Application, Activation and Usage Guide]( https://github.com/360card/giffgaff)

chunks.zh: 自助申请。
chunks.en: Apply by yourself.

chunks.zh: **也欢迎大家加入**
chunks.en: **You are also welcome to join**

chunks.zh: TG 群：[eSIM card 交流群]( https://t.me/esim_card_fans_channel) ，主题 eSIM 、eSIM 卡。
chunks.en: TG group: [eSIM card exchange group]( https://t.me/esim_card_fans_channel), theme eSIM, eSIM card.

chunks.zh: 微信群：请访问 [联系我们]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) 加入
chunks.en: WeChat group: Please visit [Contact Us]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) to join
